title: Circus Watch Faces
summary: A collection of hand drawn Circus Watch Faces for your Android Wear smartwatch

descriptionHTML:
A beautiful collection of hand drawn Circus Watch Faces for your Android Wear smartwatch

The unique style of Roberta Pagnoni, a leading contemporary children’s book illustrator, can now be enjoyed on your Android Wear smartwatch with a beautiful collection of five analog watch faces, each one presenting a special circus character.

The Watch Faces are:

- Acrobats
- Juggler
- Equilibrist
- Seal
- Elephant

and hopefully more to come!

Each Watch Face is optimized for the ambient mode, if your smartwatch supports it, and for both round and square screens.

Discover their unique way to mark the time!

All illustrations are hand made by Roberta Pagnoni: http://robertapagnoni.it
comments: Worthy of an award. When friends are curious about your Android watch, switch the face to one of these. They've always moved in for a closer look.
